Dozens of looters were detained over several days and most appeared unaware of the value of what was in the museum, gleefully ransacking the gift shop. They thought that the museum shop was the museum, said Zahi Hawass , Egypt's top archaeologist.`` These people are ignorant, they are outlaws.'' Should George Washington have been preserved and kept on display? No, because you respect the man's accomplishments and ideals, not his body. If the Russians truly respected the man, they would finally put his body to rest in a proper( non-viewing) tomb, instead of on display, like a tourist attraction. For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Franchise Tag Likely To Be Available For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Philadelphia Inquirer- The Eagles should be free to use their franchise tag on Michael Vick , despite labor uncertainty. I expect the franchise tag to continue to operate as it has in prior seasons and clubs to be permitted to exercise their rights under the tag, Jeff Pash , the NFL's general counsel, said Thursday. The Eagles and Michael Vick have had casual discussions about such a deal, a source close to the situation said.
